job_purpose: To empower Indeed teams by building and deploying AI tools that enhance job seeker experiences, save time, boost revenue, and provide technical mentorship.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and develop software systems with existing large language models using advanced techniques.
Apply ReAct frameworks to create AI agents for complex decision-making.
Partner with Salesforce’s Agentforce and Indeed’s LLM platform team to develop custom agents.
Use retrieval-augmented generation pipelines for knowledge retrieval.
Leverage vector databases for high-speed embedding storage and querying.
Adopt and extend model evaluation frameworks for accuracy and relevance.
Mentor team members in LLM deployment and MLOps.
required_qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related technical discipline.
7+ years in software engineering, with 3+ years in AI/ML or NLP.
Experience in production deployment of large language models.
Extensive experience with frameworks like Hugging Face Transformers and OpenAI API.
In-depth knowledge of model evaluation techniques.
Familiarity with ReAct frameworks and Reflection methods.
Proficiency with Salesforce ecosystem, particularly Agentforce.
Experience with retrieval-augmented generation and vector databases.
preferred_qualifications: Exposure to and excitement about AI/ML solutions.
Familiarity with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and/or SageMaker.
company_details: As the world’s number 1 job site, Indeed's mission is to help people get jobs by cultivating an inclusive and accessible workplace. The company values innovation and creating the best experience for job seekers.
